item.title: Flight Deck Equipment Cooling Supply Fans

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided flight remains within 90 minutes of a suitable landing airport.

numlitem.para: Flight restricted to 90 minutes from a suitable landing airport.

placard.para: Placard near ALTN Equip Cooling switch (overhead panel) "FLT DECK FAN INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Maintenance procedure is not required. All UPS 757 A/C have 90 minute EADIs and EHSIs installed.
